text: BREAKING: Dr. Fauci on coronavirus cases surging in the US: "We're now having 40-plus thousand new cases a day. I would not be surprised if we go up to 100,000 a day if this does not turn around and so I'm very concerned.” https://t.co/07BCSzztca
